name: Nexus Newcomer
description: Welcome to the Nexus! By linking your Steam account, you've unlocked the Nexus Newcomer badge.

name: Rising Star
description: You're a force to be reckoned with! This badge is awarded for reaching level 10.

name: Dedicated Follower
description: Your dedication knows no bounds! This badge is awarded for following at least 3 games on Nexus.

name: Achievement Hunter
description: You're always up for a challenge! This badge is awarded for unlocking at least 10 achievements across your games.

name: Friendly Face
description: You're quite the social butterfly! This badge is awarded for having at least 5 friends on Nexus.
